review_title: Randolph College is an excellent place for unique workers
pros: Their motto of "Be an Original" not only applies to the students.  Unique and freethinking individuals thrive in this workplace.  Teamwork is constant and fluid, and individual, even personal projects are often taken up and heralded by the community as a whole.
cons: Occasionally, there occurs a lack of communication between certain bodies and/or departments - and these communication absences tend to create notable problems.  However, in most cases these communication issues are fairly quickly resolved.
